Package cz.ive.process

Huge group of interfaces and classes for process managemet - supports mainly Goals, Substitutions, Expansions and process control.

Package cz.ive.process Description

Huge group of interfaces and classes for process managemet - supports mainly Goals, Substitutions, Expansions and process control. Different process can be created via various process templates. There is also basic goal class and some specific goals classes with classes for goal management. Procces control is done by process database some executor.
